Question: Intel Corporation CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Intel Corporation

Product 1

- Intel's 14th Gen HX-series of mobile processors, including the flagship Intel Core i9-14900HX with 24 cores and 32 threads, offering up to 5.8 GHz turbo frequency
- The HX-series delivers up to 17% better gaming performance compared to AMD Ryzen 9 7945X3D and up to 51% faster multitasking performance compared to AMD Ryzen 9 7945HX
- Supports up to 192GB of DDR5 memory, Thunderbolt 5, Wi-Fi 6E, Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 5.4 and 5.3
- Over 60 Intel Core 14th Gen HX-powered laptops from hardware partners will be available

Product 2

- Intel's lineup of 18 new 14th Gen desktop processors, including the top-of-the-line Core i9-14900, running at 65-watt and 35-watt power levels
- Offers up to 5.8 GHz turbo frequency, up to 37% faster multi-thread performance, and up to 7% better Microsoft Office performance compared to the prior generation
- Features support for PCIe Gen 5.0, Gen 4.0, Thunderbolt 4, and USB 3.2

Product 3

- Intel Core mobile processor Series 1 family, led by the Intel Core 7 processor 150U with 10 cores and 12 threads, and up to 5.4GHz turbo frequencies
- Supports up to 96 GB of total DDR5/DDR4 memory, Thunderbolt 4, PCIe Gen 4.0, PCIe Gen 3.0, Bluetooth 5.4 and 5.3, Intel Killer Wi-Fi 7, and Intel Killer Wi-Fi 6E
Summary_cn:
英特尔公司

产品1

- 英特尔的第14代HX系列移动处理器，包括旗舰款英特尔酷睿i9-14900HX，配备24个核心和32个线程，最高可达5.8 GHz的睿频频率
- HX系列相比AMD Ryzen 9 7945X3D在游戏性能上提升了17%，多任务处理性能提升了51%相比AMD Ryzen 9 7945HX
- 支持最高192GB DDR5内存、Thunderbolt 5、Wi-Fi 6E、Wi-Fi 7、蓝牙5.4和5.3
- 将有60多款采用英特尔第14代HX系列处理器的笔记本电脑由硬件合作伙伴提供

产品2

- 英特尔的18款全新第14代台式机处理器，包括顶级款Core i9-14900，分别采用65瓦和35瓦功耗级别
- 提供最高5.8 GHz睿频频率，以及相比上一代产品，多线程性能提升最多37%，微软Office性能提升最多7%
- 支持PCIe Gen 5.0、Gen 4.0、Thunderbolt 4和USB 3.2

产品3

- 英特尔酷睿移动处理器系列1家族，以英特尔酷睿i7-150U为首，配备10个核心和12个线程，最高可达5.4 GHz的睿频频率
- 支持最高96GB DDR5/DDR4内存、Thunderbolt 4、PCIe Gen 4.0、PCIe Gen 3.0、蓝牙5.4和5.3、英特尔终极杀手Wi-Fi 7以及英特尔终极杀手Wi-Fi 6E
